summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 4, Plat of Columbia, being the alley between Americus Street and Angeline Street, from 39th Avenue South to 42nd Avenue South; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 109661 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
